project.name: FaithForge Labs
project.description: A Christian-based creative lab building physical tools that combine faith, technology, and productivity.

cross.description: Bold, thick, and white-hot. Embedded directly into the anvil with a molten branding effect at the base.

lightning.description: Single bolt from Heaven to the cross. Terminates cleanly at impact point. No upward arcs or floor bleed.

anvil.description: Forged, beveled structure with visible weight. Embedded tech-style circuitry. Realistic lighting and surface heat variation.

circuitry.description: Activated from the cross impact. Directional flow (white/blue → red). Features energy pulses, glows, and bevel depth.

flames.description: Originate from beneath the anvil, not floating. Condensed, upward-reaching tongue shapes. Gradient: blue/white core → orange mid → red/ember tips. Light bleed on nearby surfaces.

halo.description: Soft circular glow above the cross. Contains radial light beams and cosmic shimmer. Represents divine presence without overpowering.

background.description: Subtle celestial mist, heat distortion, ambient rays. Creates spiritual context without distracting from the logo’s core.

typography.labs: Red-hot finish, slightly glowing from below.

hidden_symbolism.description: Optional scripture lines (e.g., Isaiah 54:16) faintly etched in circuit paths. Visuals suggest purification, divine spark, and heavenly forging of tools.

products.name: Prayer Focus Cube
products.description: A scripture-based interactive cube using ESP32, OLED, LED ring, and a button. Designed for daily verse display and spiritual focus.

business_model.long_term_goal: Replace full-time job with scalable faith-based product business
product_philosophy: Christian-integrated tools for discipline, prayer, and productivity
Embedded tech where appropriate (ESP32, OLED, microcontrollers)
Preference for AI-enhanced, scripture-aligned smart gear
